body_html:
I can confirm that @phvu answer is working quite well. Just look through the configure script and you will find many lines like
if [ -z "$PYTHON_BIN_PATH" ]; then
so, it will ask interactively e.g. for the Python path if you do not set the $PYTHON_BIN_PATH variable.

But if you set all the variables, it will work without further asking.
body_text:

But if you set all the variables, it will work without further asking.
body:
I can confirm that @phvu answer is working quite well. Just look through the configure script and you will find many lines like 
`if [ -z "$PYTHON_BIN_PATH" ]; then`
so, it will ask interactively e.g. for the Python path if you do not set the $PYTHON_BIN_PATH variable.

But if you set all the variables, it will work without further asking.
